content: bunny beanie materials 3 different colored skeins of worsted weight yarn approximately 40 g/100 yds of main color 10 g/20 yds of contrast color 1 5 g/10 yds of contrast color 2 size us 7/4 5 mm 16-inch/40 cm circular needles size us 8/5 0 mm 16-inch/40 cm circular needles size us 8/5 0 mm double pointed needles 1 stich marker optionally 6 extra markers to separate chart repeats tapestry needle and scissors gauge 17 stitches and 24 row = 4 inches in pattern abbreviations k - knit p - purl k2tog - knit two together mc - main color cc - contrast color mc in main color cast on 84 stitches on us 7/4 5 mm needles place stitch marker and join in the round being careful not to twist cc1 cc2 ribbing row 1-10 worked in main color *k1 p1* repeat until end of round switch to us 8/5 0 mm needles row 11-17 knit in main color row 18-42 work from chart row 43 knit across row 44 *k5 k2tog* repeat until end of round row 45 knit across row 46 *k4 k2tog* repeat until end of round row 47 knit across row 48 *k3 k2tog* repeat until end of round row 49 knit across row 50 *k2 k2tog* repeat until end of round switch to dpns row 51 knit across row 52 *k1 k2tog* repeat until end of round row 53 k2tog for entire round row 54 *k1 k2tog* repeat until end of round cut yarn and pull through remaining loops weave in ends
